primaryHost/about:
Hello, we are Debbie and Wayne Muncy and we’re  excited to have been hosting since 2020. Wayne is a minister and we have worked in ministry for years. Wayne also works full time as a custodian and I am a retired nurse.  We currently take care of my mother and another lady who has been a part of our family for 23 years. We have two grown children and two little grandsons. 
We live here locally and have all of our lives. Our goal for our guests is to have a pleasant and enjoyable visit while here in WV. Please feel free to contact us anytime during your stay. We’d be happy to assist you.
sectionedDescription/access:
There is PARKING in front of the house, back and side, as well as, in the back across the alley road directly behind the house. The whole area is graveled. When unloaded there’s room to park. If you have several trailering, there is EXTRA PARKING available at the school located 4 houses down at the back entrance. It is very easy to see, can’t miss it. 
The water hose is on the FRONT side of the house if you need to wash off your ride. You can pull up an park there or pull the hose around the front to the other side and back if you’d like.
The storage building in back yard is not accessible to guests, neither is the basement.
sectionedDescription/description:
Located approximately 8 minutes to the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trail System. We are on Rt 16, part of the”Head of the Dragon” Motorcycle Riding Route in Caretta, WV.  You will have easy access to “The Warrior trail” at Caretta or at War. 
The house  sleeps 9 and there's space for addition air mattresses. We have gravel parking in the front, back and side of property. There is a HOT water on demand system, Cable TV, WiFi, kitchen, and washer/Dryer.

You can access the trail from Caretta or ride over to War which is a 6 min ride to Grants Supermarket🍎🍉🥦🥑and the local restaurants, The Owl,🌭🍟
The Holy Moly Cafe🍔🥗🍕🍽🥧 also 
Taco Todd’s 🌮and, A Scoop of Heaven 🍧🍦🧋
You can get gas ⛽️ at Hillbilly Market and purchase Trail permits. We also have Walgreens and a Dollar General. A two minute drive through town will take you to the Warrior Trailhead. You may travel anywhere on your ATV, or SxS.
Berwind Lake is about 4 miles from War. There’s fishing, Canoeing, picnics and a beautiful hiking trail to walk around the lake. The 💧lakes swimming pool 💧is open this season.
At  the upper end of the lake you can ride a dirt road across barewallow hollow which is a beautiful adventurous ride.

There is PARKING in front of the house, back and side, as well as, in the back across the alley road directly behind the house. The whole area is graveled. When unloaded there’s room to park. If you have several trailering, there is EXTRA PARKING available at the school located 4 houses down at the back entrance. It is very easy to see, can’t miss it. 
The water hose is on the FRONT side of the house if you need to wash off your ride. You can pull up an park there or pull the hose around the front to the other side and back if you’d like.
The storage building in back yard is not accessible to guests, neither is the basement.

We live locally and encourage you to contact us with any questions or assistance you may need. We would be glad to help with directions or points of interest. It is our goal to help your stay be enjoyable.

We are just a 6 minute ride to War, WV where we have Grants supermarket. There is a Walgreens, Dollar General, Hillbilly Market (where you can gas up your ATV). Restaurants are Holy Moly Cafe, The Owl, Taco Todd’s  and A scoop of Heaven across the street from the Dollar General. 
The Warrior Trail Head is in War, WV and the trail office to obtain trail passes. Berwind Lake is approximately 4 miles from War, WV  there is a pool at the lake. 
We are only a 20 min ride to Welch, WV from the house and Coalwood is 10 minutes, where there is a Country Corner Store on main road and gas available. At Coalwood you can take frog level road to the end and go to Wilmore dam

Welch has a Wendy’s, Goodsons Supermarket, McDonalds, Subway, KFC, PIzza Hut, Walgreens, and Welch Community Hospiital. A must try is the Sterling Drive In. You can find them online or look in our guidebook on  this listing. There is the Pocahontas Theater. In Welch, WV, and Linkous Park is in Welch.

Our county is ATV friendly. You are welcome to ride your ATV wherever you may want to go.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Not suitable for infants and young toddlers due to safety issues, example, the home has stairs and there are no baby gates or cribs yet.

We ask, before checking out please leave the house as you found it. Please clean up what you have used. Thank you for being our guest.

1. Clean out the refrigerator and microwave then put the dishes in the dishwasher and please start it. Wipe down anything in the kitchen that has been used. 

2.  Put dirty towels in the hamper in the washroom. 

3. Sweep if needed, And take out the garbage to trash cans outside. 

4. Do Not remove bed sheets or spread. The housekeeper will remove for laundry.
 
5. Turn off heat/ air conditioner and lights in each room. 
  
6. Text CHECKED OUT through Airbnb App

Thank you for coming!

primaryHost/about:
Christian Couple who loves to enjoy time together in the outdoors! We enjoy meeting new people, and spending time with family and friends.
We are parents, grandparents.. youth leaders, business owners... dog-lovers!
When we get a free moment we take off to WV to ride Four-wheelers with our friends and family. We love to discover new trails, sights, and attractions. 
We are new at hosting, but excited to share our home with others who love to get "out and about"!

sectionedDescription/description:
2 Bedroom 1 bath creekside house located 7 minutes from War, WV. Just off Warrior trail#16. 
Surrounded by mountains and Outlaw Trails. Cozy dine in kitchen, comfortable living room with smart tv and wifi.
plenty of parking for trucks and trailers. Creekside firepit and charcoal grill for outdoor entertaining.

All access to the house

Feel free to contact us with any questions or concerns, or if you just want advice on some of the Outlaw Trails.

This house is located just minutes from access to Warrior Trail # 16, from the town of  War for restaurants, gas and groceries, and from Berwind Lake for scenic route and relaxation.

There is parking available on both sides and in front of this house for trucks and trailers. You can ride your ATVs almost anywhere you want to go from this house.

Local grocery store and restaurants are only 7 minutes away. Most close by around 8 pm if not earlier. The gas station remains open until around 11 pm.

sectionedDescription/description:
- Very close to The Hatfield McCoy Trail in Welch, WV
- FREE Wi-Fi
- Air Conditioning
- Sundeck
- FREE Parking for up to 5 trucks w/trailers
- Restaurants Drug Store within walking distance

Looking for a thrilling outdoor experience? Our resort boasts miles of world-class ATV trails that are perfect for adventurers of all levels. Explore the picturesque forests and breathtaking mountains of West Virginia on your ATV, and enjoy an unforgettable experience that will leave you wanting more.

Beautiful sundeck with a fire pit to enjoy on those cool summer nights!

We are open 24 hours a day / 7 days a week.

Close to The Hatfield McCoy Trail and The Pocahontas Theater in Welch, WV

Restaurants, movie theater, and drug store are within walking distance

primaryHost/about: I enjoy traveling to new places and meeting new people. my children are my favorite people on earth!
sectionedDescription/access: guess have entire apartment with private entrance and stairwell. the private fenced backyard with fire pit and comfortable patio chairs. large carport and Street side parking
sectionedDescription/description:
This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.Located in the heart of Welch. Part of the Hatfield and McCoy trail system.

this basement apartment is like staying in a cozy nostalgic time capsule. located in a quiet, historic, beautiful Mountainside neighborhood. the extensive Stone walls and stairways is reminiscent of Villas in Italy. 360 degree Mountain views. overlook the river while enjoying the sound.

guess have entire apartment with private entrance and stairwell. the private fenced backyard with fire pit and comfortable patio chairs. large carport and Street side parking

guess can reach me by text or Airbnb messaging or if I am within sight

the neighborhood is composed of many big beautiful older homes. built on four different Mountainside tiers. this is a safe, quiet, friendly residential area. located on the very south east end of Welch. the downtown area is directly down Riverside Drive to the West. there is Renegade Outfitters for Trail Riders. 3 Exxon convenience stores and 1 Exxon gas station. two grocery stores within 3 miles or less. Dollar General and Family Dollar combo Dollar Store. a shoe show. one locally owned thrift store and one antique store all within three miles. the Pocahontas movie theater approximately one mile. McDonald's, KFC, Wendy's, Pizza Hut, Subway fast food restaurants within 3 miles or less. The Howdy house, Sterling Drive In,  spikes dawg house, and three little cupcakes bakery, independently owned restaurants all within six miles or less.

personal vehicle, walking, public transportation. best of all the town of Welch and many surrounding towns are ATV friendly. Therefore you can ride on most streets. trail connector signs are placed well to assist Riders.

there is plenty of ATV traffic on roads around location.

name: The Heartland Lodge w/50 amp RV site/full hookup
sectionedDescription/access: You will have access to the whole house. House will be equipped with washer and dryer, stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave. The house is fully stocked with everything you need with all your amenities like shampoo and soap to towels and washcloths to pots and pans. We will have trail maps available at the house for your convenience. We also have a grill and outdoor area with a fire pit.
sectionedDescription/description:
Recently completely remodeled and in a great location. Less than 1/2 a mile from the Hatfield and McCoy Warrior trailhead, gas station and grocery. The warrior trail connects to 3 other trails Indian ridge, Pocahontas, & Pinnacle. You can access 400+ miles of H&M trails and unlimited amount of outlaw. This house is within 3 miles of 7 restaurants, 2 grocery stores and 3 trails (warrior/pinnacle/Indian ridge) Everything is accessible by ATV! We are here to make your trip the best trip ever!

Best location in the area!! In the heart of Hatfield and McCoy. We are less than a 1/2 a miles from the warrior trail and within 3 miles of the connector trail to Indian ride and pinnacle. Also Indian ridge connects to Pocahontas! So 4 trails accessible from this house. Not to mention unlimited amount of outlaw trails close by. It’s also within 3 miles of the trail head to the wagon wheel/riders paradise!! This house is located within 3 miles of Wendy’s, McDonald’s, Subway, Pizza Hut, Sterling Drive-In, huddle hut, and KFC. It’s also within 3 miles of a four wheeler store and repair shop, car wash, 2 grocery stores, 3 gas stations, advance auto, shoe show, family dollar, dollar tree, hardware store, and mechanic shop. Its within a mile of 2 drug stores and a movie theatre! It’s within 1 mile of linkous park which has FREE tennis courts, a basketball court, walking path, and a nice playground for kids. There’s also a very nice outdoor pool there also! Theres a great outdoor area at the house for just setting around the campfire and enjoying the evening after a great day riding the Hatfield and McCoy trails, white water rafting, skiing, hunting, or hiking the great mountains of WV! All amenities are included and then some!!  We have grill, WiFi, washer and dryer, stove, refrigerator, dish washer, 6 beds, and a fully stocked house with everything you need. We also have trail maps available at the house. Everything is accessible by ATV once you get here there’s no need to get back in your vehicle!! No trailering needed to get to any of these places!! If you need more room we have a nice camper that sleeps 10 that we can pull in and set up for additional guests. We also rent out kayaks and our Honda pioneer 1000 which is a 5 seater in a package deal if needed and we have a 50 amp full hookup for a camper. To use the hookup it will be an additional $50 a night to be paid at the time of booking. Ask for details on RV hookup or any of these extras we will have to do that outside of Airbnb..So come and enjoy some southern hospitality! We want you to make your trip a yearly experience! Come and enjoy the mountains of West Virginia!! Looking forward to seeing you soon!!

You will have access to the whole house. House will be equipped with washer and dryer, stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave. The house is fully stocked with everything you need with all your amenities like shampoo and soap to towels and washcloths to pots and pans. We will have trail maps available at the house for your convenience. We also have a grill and outdoor area with a fire pit.

We are available for questions at anytime. We are here to make your stay one you will never forget and make into a yearly tradition!! We are local and will be happy to help you out in any way possible. Feel free to contact us at anytime! We look forward to accommodating your stay to West Virginia!!

Once you book your trip we will give you the access code to the door entrance.

24 hour cancellation requested

Welcome to Creekside Cottage.. We are also located one minute off "Head of the Dragon" driving route #16! Newly updated home  in a quiet neighborhood.

Most furnishings in the home are new or like new!

all of the property is at your disposable except the carage. that us our only storage space.

Hope to have you as a guest in our home! We are not on property but assistance is just a few minutes away! And we are always here for questions and concerns.

Working class family quiet neighborhood

There is a car wash in town War.  The hillbillygas station sells permits and has free spare maps as well as the trail head office. The closest hospital is in Welch.

name: Black Diamond ATV Lodge
primaryHost/about: I love riding in West Virginia and want to share my place with you
sectionedDescription/access: Full access
sectionedDescription/description:
The Black Diamond ATV Lodge in Welch, WV is the perfect place to stage your next Hatfield McCoy trails adventure.  Consider this your second home as you will have the whole house just for you.  On the main floor there are 3 bedrooms, living room, dining, kitchen, laundry, and bath. See guidebook for more details.

The whole house plus the garage is yours to use

Full access

email at blackdiamondwelchwv@gmail.com

Three major trail heads close by copies of Hatfield maps can be emailed as well as picked up at any pass retailer there are copies in the living room (please leave for the next guest)

Lots of parking  can accommodate three trucks and trailers

Cameras aren’t in use after check in
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No cats.   Please don't leave dogs  in the home unattended the garage is fine.  Please avoid pets on the furniture. Smoking is ok outside, please clean up your butts.

sectionedDescription/description:
Most Popular Rental
Midway between Warrior, Indian,
& Pinnacle Trails -with connector
to Pocahontas Trail. (400 miles to ride)
Garage to lock ATV's

     ⁕     Ample parking 
     ⁕     Ride ATV's anywhere in area.

name: Cozy Two Bedroom Apartment located in Welch
photos/14/caption: Guests have access to the front yard
photos/15/caption: View from the front door
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy the modern and vintage charm of our 1920's home. Located in the heart of McDowell County in Welch, West Virginia. We take pride in offering the most comfortable hypoallergenic bedding for a wonderful night's sleep and the softest towels so our guests will have a lavish experience.

This apartment is located in a home with an additional unit across the hall and it is above another apartment. It is located across the way from City Hall and the Welch Library.

We thoroughly clean and disinfect after each guest's stay. The cleaners and detergents used on our property are eco-friendly, sustainable and biodegradable.

Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. It is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.

As hosts, we are always available for any assistance and advice while guests navigate the area.

There is truly no other place like Welch, WV. Once a booming coal town, Welch now has a much smaller population. Welch and McDowell County have garnered much attention over the past decade. The New York Times and CNN have published and produced different pieces highlighting the county and its unique way of life that still exists here in the mountains. Even the late chef, author, and documentarian, Anthony Bourdain spent time filming in McDowell and was quoted saying it was one of the most unique places he had traveled to.
 https://www.wvpress.org/breaking-news/anthony-bourdain-mcdowell-best-place-earth/

You can see McDowell County's episode on season 11 of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown.

This home is within walking distance to a gas station, a library, town hall and the movie theatre. The Jack Caffrey Arts and Culture Center is a short distance away. Small shops, grocery stores and restaurants are all one to five miles away. There is a Bluefield Area Transit Bus route that runs through town on weekdays.

There is no kitchen in this unit. There is a key code for the front door of the house and for the apartment door. There are stairs  leading to this apartment.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We prefer no shoes in the apartment. 
Please leave beds unmade.

photos/0/caption:
Newly Renovated very nice, clean, spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bath, kitchen and living room house. Perfect fit for large groups or small. Convenient for riding HMT trails or outlaw trails.
Quiet neighborhood plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.
photos/1/caption: Spacious living room with a large sectional sofa and extra seating.  Plenty of comfy seating to lounge around  after a day on the trails. Also includes a futon couch that can be used for additional sleeping arrangements.
photos/2/caption: Amenities include a 65" flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime, etc), high speed Wifi and a designated work space.
photos/3/caption:
Fully equipped, large eat in kitchen. 
Perfect for large groups or a small family to dine in during your stay.
photos/5/caption: Maybe one of the most important things in the house. The coffee pot! Both a single serve as well as a regular pot. If you are like me we gotta have our coffee.
photos/6/caption: Bedroom #1 has 2 queen size comfy beds. Extra blankets and fresh linens. It also has a walk in closet and an on Suite adjoining bathroom.
photos/7/caption:
On suite adjoining bathroom with bedroom #1. Clean towels,
Fully stocked with all the necessities soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/8/caption: On suite bathroom 5' ceramic tiled walk in shower for bedroom #1.
photos/9/caption: Bedroom #2 Sleeps 3. 1 comfy queen size bed and 1 single bed. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rod with hangers.
photos/10/caption: 2nd bathroom shared by bedroom two and 3. Fully stocked necessities hair dryer, soap, shampoo, etc.
photos/11/caption: 2nd bathroom 36" ceramic tiled walk in shower.
photos/12/caption: Bedroom #3 has 2 comfy full size beds. Clean linens and extra blankets. Clothes hanging rods with hangers.
photos/13/caption: Laundry area extra large drum washer and dryer to wash riding clothes. Comes complete with laundry soap and a iron.
photos/14/caption: Yes it's true! We have parking to accommodate your trucks, trailers and equipment.
photos/15/caption: Entrance off of War Cove Circle. Well lit with security lights.
photos/16/caption: Covered Patio/Porch with outdoor seating and a gas grill. Perfect for sitting out at night and watching the stars.
photos/17/caption: Enjoy the evenings sitting by the fire pit talking and spending quality time with your family and friends. There's also a set of corn hole boards in the master closet.
photos/18/caption: Electronic lock for easy check in when you arrive.
photos/19/caption: Exterior security cameras for added security
photos/20/caption: Plenty of parking for trucks and trailers
photos/21/caption: Entrance to the house off of War Cove Circle
photos/24/caption:
Rick and I own A Scoop of Heaven
Best icecream in town. Open seasonally April-October. THU-SAT  from 12-9pm. Stop by and say hey and get a 10% discount.
photos/25/caption: ATV friendly town off load when you get here and drive you ATV where ever you want to go. The Owl serves inexpensive but tasty breakfast, lunch and dinner 6 days a week and lunch and opens at noon on Sundays.
photos/26/caption: Warrior Trailhead office sells HMT passes as well as souvenirs. Located on River Rd. Open from 9am-2pm everyday.
primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart... 

Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trailhead.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas and grocery store.  We are an ATV friendly town and house is located in friendly quiet Neighborhood with plenty of parking for trucks and trailers.

The Main house features 3 Bedrooms, 2 full baths, open kitchen-dining room, living room and laundry area. It sleeps up to 13 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The Master Bedroom has a private Bath with a large tiled shower. The main bathroom is shared between the 2 remaining bedrooms.

Living room has a 65" flat screen TV with Roku access (Netfix, Prime, etc.) and WIFI. It also has a sectional sofa, extra seating, and a small desk workspace. 

Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils . Large covered front porch with a Bbq grill and outdoor seating. Fire ring in the yard for those cool evenings back at the house.
This House has a suite on the backside that can be rented with or separate from the House.
Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest has full access to the house and yard. This property also has a Suite on the backside of the house that can be purchased along with or seperate.

Our mission is to make your stay at The Cove House as enjoyable as possible. 

We live locally and respect your privacy.  We'll give you the space that you want or the help you might need.

Located on the entrance to Hatfield McCoys Warrior Trail with direct connections to Pinnacle Creek, Indian Ridge and Pocahantas Trail. Located off 16 WV part of the 91 mile Head of the Dragon Motorcycle Ride, in McDowell County.

Quiet Neighborhood in a welcoming small town with all the conveniences Restaurants,  Grocery store  and gas station.

War is a ATV friendly town, so you can feel free to ride your ATV everywhere during the duration of your stay  or directly to the trail head with no trailering

Day trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

**Check out our other Listings**
Cove Suite
The Calvary House
The Calvary Suite

primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.

sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...
Surrounded by mountains and located right around the corner from the Hatfield McCoy Warrior Trailhead office.
Enjoy High Rocks, Wilmore Dam or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, hiking or boating. 
Easy access to restaurants, gas station, and grocery store. We are an ATV friendly town and House is located in quiet friendly neighborhood with plenty of parking.

Features 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with washer and dryer, Eat in galley kitchen living room.
it sleeps 6 and is fully equipped with clean linens, towels and bedding.
The bathroom features a 36" ceramic tile shower. 
Livingroom has a 55" Roku flat screen TV and Wifi. It also has a sofa and chair.
Fully equipped kitchen with dishes, flatware and kitchen utensils. Covered front porch with Bbq grill and outdoor seating. 
Look us up on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest have full access with private entrance and private parking. This unit is part of the main house but you will be amazed at how private it is.
Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...

Surrounded by Mountains and conveniently located, direct access to Warrior Trailhead and High Rocks. Enjoy Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking.

This can be purchased with the main house or as a stand alone unit. If purchased together the price will be reduced to $40 a night.
 Guest will have entire space to themselves.

Cozy suite convient for 1 or 2 people looking for a peaceful getaway. Features 1 Bedroom/1 Full Bath, and a Kitchenette with breakfast nook (refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker.) Comes with clean linens, towels, and bedding. 
Bedroom has a flatscreen TV with Roku access (Netflix, Prime etc.) and WIFI.
Has a private entrance.  Perfect for traveling with a group that purchases the main house but likes your own space or traveling as a couple alone.

Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.

Guest have full access with private entrance and private parking. This unit is part of the main house but you will be amazed at how private it is.
Your own outdoor space with a firepit and bbq grill.

Our Mission is to make your stay at The Cove Suite as enjoyable as possible.

We live locally and respect your privacy. We'll give you the space that you want or the help that you need.

Quiet Neighborhood, close to everything. Welcoming small town with all the conveniences.
Restaurants, grocery store and gas station. 

Warrior Trail with direct connection to Pinnacle Creek,  Indiana Ridge, and Pocahantas Trail.

Located off of RT 16 WV

War is a ATV friendly town, you are welcome to ride your ATV anywhere for the duration of your stay. No trailering to the trailhead entrance.

Day trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

name: Spacious One Bedroom Located in Welch
priceDetails/0/value: $10 per night after the first guest
primaryHost/about: My wife Elise and I have lived in McDowell County since November 2015. We moved from New England to help the community through outreach and ministry and we've fallen in love with the area and the people here. We love to go for walks, listen to music, travel anywhere & everywhere, and meet new friends.
sectionedDescription/access: Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. The apartment is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy our newly remodeled apartment in the heart of historic Welch. This unit was designed with the traveling professional in mind; quiet, easily accessible and comfortable.

Our spacious one bedroom is the perfect getaway for travelers to the area. Whether you are a nurse, teacher, other working professional or are just looking to stay in Welch, this is the place for you. 

We offer optimal Wi-Fi and have a television with a Roku for your viewing pleasure. 

A fully equipped kitchen and pleasant dining room will cater to any culinary needs.

Enjoy the scenic mountain view from our quiet and cozy front porch. Park right in front of the residence. The apartment is a two minute walk from downtown Welch.

There is truly no other place like Welch, WV. Once a booming coal town, Welch now has a much smaller population. Welch and McDowell County have garnered much attention over the past decade. The New York Times and CNN have published and produced different pieces highlighting the county and its unique way of life that still exists here in the mountains. Even the late chef, author, and documentarian, Anthony Bourdain spent time filming in McDowell and was quoted saying it was one of the most unique places he had traveled to.
 https://www.wvpress.org/breaking-news/anthony-bourdain-mcdowell-best-place-earth/

You can see McDowell County's episode on season 11 of Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown.

This home is within walking distance to a gas station, a library, town hall and the movie theatre. The Jack Caffrey Arts and Culture Center is a short distance away. Small shops, grocery stores and restaurants are all one to five miles away. There is a Bluefield Area Transit Bus route that runs through town on weekdays.

There are stairs leading up to the house and upon entry, there are stairs leading to the unit.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please leave beds unmade.
We prefer no shoes in the apartment.
